text: Rupert Bear, Follow the Magic... is a British animated children's television series. It is based on the Mary Tourtel character, Rupert Bear. Aimed at pre- school children, the show is part stop motion, part computer-generated imagery. It aired on Five from 8 November 2006 to 1 February 2008, as part of their Milkshake! block. 52 episodes were produced. title: Rupert Bear, Follow the Magic...
